description: Fuzzy Navel is a delicious summer cocktail that can be served in a variety of ways. You can drink this on the rocks or as a frozen margarita! Plus, the recipe for this festive drink is easy to make, and it's perfect for any occasion.
name: Fuzzy Navel

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the orange juice and peach schnapps into a shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the orange juice and peach schnapps into a shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well for 30 seconds, then serve it on the rocks or pour over crushed ice in a highball glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well for 30 seconds, then serve it on the rocks or pour over crushed ice in a highball glass.
